creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: three vertical pointed panels (approx. 3-1/2" wide) separated on narrow waistband with end ties; top of each has pounded indigo piece, bottom has many styles of embroidery in red, green, beige, and is lined with printed fabric; red and blue edging on each panel; each panel has side trim of seeds and white feathers and one dangling trim of beads and feathers at top; three seed and tassel trims also at top; one seed tassel 6" from bototm of center panel; separating the three main panels are 4 long, narrow print fabric bands with weighted batik medallions at ends (one is embroidered); similar narrow band with meadllion on PR and PL
medium: Cotton, seeds, feathers, beads, metal ring
title: Skirt, from a two-piece set
